title: Sketch2App.io
description: Sketch2App.io transforms hand-drawn sketches into functional code for frameworks like React and React Native. Unlike other coding assistants that work with your code editor, while chatting with Sketch2App, it generates CodeSandboxes and displays the generated app directly in chat. Stay in flow & iterate with natural language - Sketch2app is the first ever chat chatbot that previews, generates and iterates on your generation all in one chat.
